scripts.start: echo "This is a start script" && exit 0
scripts.prestart: echo "This is a pre-start script" && exit 0
scripts.poststart: echo "This is a post-start script" && exit 0
scripts.stop: echo "This is a stop script" && exit 0
scripts.prestop: echo "This is a pre-stop script" && exit 0
scripts.poststop: echo "This is a post-stop script" && exit 0
scripts.custom: echo "This is a CUSTOM script" && exit 0
scripts.precustom: echo "This is a PRE CUSTOM script" && exit 0
scripts.postcustom: echo "This is a POST CUSTOM script" && exit 0
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run webpack && npm run static
